W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
250 CHAMPION STREET
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
DIVISION OF EDUCATION
MAURICE F. SEAY
June 2, 1959
PHONE WO 8-8118
DIRECTOR
Mr. Harry J. Skornia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
With your letter of May 27th you enclose a revised 1959-60
budget for the first year of our new project which begins
July 1, 1959* This budget totals $51,903<Â»^0. You estimate
that you will receive $9,165.00 as income from other sources
and that you will request from this Foundation $42,738*^0.
I am glad to approve this budget.
Sincerely,
Maurice F. Seay
MFS/fh
